channel.title: Portfolios on R at the Margin
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolios on R at the Margin

item.title: Data Science for Algorithmic Trading
item.description: This is my effort of following an article written by Daniel Shapiro, PhD on Medium about using R to perform algorithmic trading. The content is coming soon.

item.title: Make Something Shiny
item.description: One of the things that I would love to do is make Shiny apps. I will blog about my effort. The content is coming soon.

item.title: Quantitative Analyst with R
item.description: Some time later in 2020, I will take the course “Quantitative Analyst with R” on Datacamp. Content to come.

item.title: Name of the work 6
item.description: Fifth abundantly made Give sixth hath. Cattle creature i be don't them.

item.title: Name of the work 8
item.description: Fifth abundantly made Give sixth hath. Cattle creature i be don't them.

item.title: Item with image
item.description: Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts. A small river named Duden flows by their place and supplies it with the necessary regelialia. It is a paradisematic country, in which roasted parts of sentences fly into your mouth.
